summary: The diff updates the proposal grid to render 6 static photo tiles via a new StaticPhotoTile component and removes visible local-upload UI from App.tsx, while adding per-tile fallback placeholders. However, the actual 6 JPG assets requested are not shown as added in the diff summary, and there are unrelated style/config/HTML changes not requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add the 6 newly uploaded images as static frontend assets and ensure they are included in the build output with these exact filenames.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary does not show any of the six .jpg files being added to the repo (e.g., under a public/static assets directory). App.tsx references them, but their existence/inclusion in the build output cannot be verified from the provided changes.
evidence: File diff summary: Added files list does not include any .jpg assets

hallucinated_features.description: Changed the HTML page title and added Google Fonts preconnect/links (Poppins).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest did not ask for HTML title/font changes; it focused on photo grid assets and removing upload UI/state.
evidence: frontend/index.html (per frontend-file-summaries.txt: updated title "Valentine Proposal ðŸ’˜" and Google Fonts links)

hallucinated_features.description: Tailwind theme/config changes (custom pink palette and shadow).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-18..REQ-21; the request was to keep layout/interactions intact and only update the grid/remove upload UI.
evidence: frontend/tailwind.config.js (per frontend-file-summaries.txt: extended pink theme palette and shadow)

hallucinated_features.description: Additional styling/token changes in global CSS unrelated to the static grid and upload UI removal.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; may risk violating the 'keep existing layout' intent.
evidence: frontend/src/index.css (per frontend-file-summaries.txt: global styles/fonts and pink theme tokens)

hallucinated_features.description: Modified/retained useLocalPhotoTilePreviews hook implementation (supports selecting up to 2 images).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-20 focuses on removing local upload functionality from the proposal page; keeping/updating this hook is unrequested work unless it is still used elsewhere (not shown in the diff summary).
evidence: frontend/src/hooks/useLocalPhotoTilePreviews.ts (listed under MODIFIED FILES and described in frontend-file-summaries.txt)
